results.title: The Escapade
results.brief_description:
Edward Jnr doesn’t want to end up like his father. He decides to take flight and travel the road to Dreamland, a road that will transform his life, or will it!
Music by Christopher Deane. No dialogue.

results.title: Hikikomori: alienation through technology
results.brief_description:
“In the year 2004, it was expected that 1 million young adults will withdraw from the Japanese society.” This interpretative performance piece explores Hikikomori through representational images - a sculpture of animation and art.
Performers: Yee Wei, Lester King. No dialogue, music soundtrack only.

results.title: Awaiting re-construction
results.brief_description: Interpretative piece on the power of images, both visually and textually, and the loss of identity, particularly for women, in western culture today. Uses a combination of animation, live-action and voice-over.

results.title: Little blue planet
results.brief_description: A contemplative piece about the little blue planet we call earth. Portrays the chaotic pace of modern city life through a montage of stunning images and a pulsating music soundtrack, “Thunder downunder” composed and performed by Markus Kellow.

results.title: The Bittersweet tale of Doffy Notts
results.brief_description:
Everyone loves Doffy Notts the clown - he makes you laugh. But hidden beneath the layers of makeup and costume is a very different Doffy Notts - a very sad and lonely Doffy Notts.
A beautifully crafted work using 2D and 3D animation.

results.title: I am not alone

results.title: Stan
results.brief_description: This 3D computer animated tragedy tells the story in verse of a mad scientist who creates a human boy. A rework of the classic Frankenstein story, this black fairytale adds a new element to the tale.
